description.narrative: Existing and potential/start-up SMEs, as the carriers of economic development in their areas Minority communities while direct approaches will be made to minority groups, women and youth groups in targeted regions so the maximum awareness of activities and maximum participation is ensured The whole population of targeted region would benefit from strong economy of minority areas, as they will eventually have to get involved into economic flows outside their communities, especially with growth of their businesses

Outcome(s) Indicator (s): Target(s):
Gracanica municipality increased capacity of their staff to provide better services to beneficiaries. # of new services established 5
Increased opportunity for developing new and expanding existing business # of SMEs started or grown 10 Through supported SMEs open possibility for increasing job position and employing new workers # of new job created 15
Successful matchmakings of supported beneficiaries # of matchmaking accomplished 5
Output(s) Indicator (s): Target(s):
1.1. Increased capacity of Gracanica municipality staff in business services by study visit to Kragujevac # of staff certified 5 1.2. Increased capacity of Gracanica municipality staff in business services by study visit to Bar # of staff certified 5
2.1. Promotional campaign on program details launched programme through printed material, radio adds, tv commercial, etc # of potential beneficiaries from targeted municipalities informed about the project Population of targeted municipalities
2.2. Entrepreneurship Introduction training organized in 4 municipalities # of potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 60 2.3. Organized training on basic accounting and finance issues for local potential and existing entrepreneurs in 4 municipalities # potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 60 2.4. Organized training on marketing issues in 4 municipalities # of potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 60 2.5. Organized business plan writing trainings in 4 municipalities # potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 60 2.6. Organized specialized training on agricultural production in 4 municipalities # of potential and existing entrepreneurs certified 60 2.7. Organized participations of Project beneficiaries on BPC under SPARK Guarantee fund. # of business plans approved by jury 30 2.8. Organized SME Management training for existing business in 4 municipalities # of existing entrepreneurs certified 30 2.9. Organized specialized consulting services for most promising business # of beneficiaries supported 10

Strategy 1
Municipality of Gracanica staff visit BSC Kragujevac and have 2 day training on establishing and running a BSC Municipality of Gracanica staff visit BSC Bar and have 2 day training on establishing and running a BSC
Strategy 2
2.1. Promotion of trainings and Business Plan Competition
2.2. Organizing Entrepreneurship Introduction trainings in 4 municipalities
2.3. Organizing training on basic accounting and finance issues for local potential and existing entrepreneurs in 4 municipalities
2.4. Organizing training on marketing issues for local potential and existing entrepreneurs in 4 municipalities
2.5. Organizing business plan writing trainings in 4 municipalities for potential and existing entrepreneurs
2.6. Organizing specialized training on agricultural production for local potential and existing entrepreneurs in 4 municipalities
2.7. Organizing participation of project beneficiaries on BPC under SPARK loans fund and Municipal grant fund.
2.8. Organizing SME Management training for existing business in 4 municipalities
2.9. Organizing specialized consulting services for most promising business
